definition.value: The type of activity in which it is relevant to use a module/element having this use context (see http://hl7.org/fhir/metadatatypes.html#UsageContext). For this context type, the value should be a code taken from the http://ehealth.sundhed.dk/vs/activitydefinition-code value set

value.value: Type af aktivitet i hvilken det er relevant at benytte det modul/element/ressource, der har nærværende brugskontekst (UsageContext).

definition.value: The type of activity supported by a module/element having this use context (see http://hl7.org/fhir/metadatatypes.html#UsageContext). For this context type, the value should be a code taken from the http://ehealth.sundhed.dk/vs/activitydefinition-code value set

value.value: Type af aktivitet understøttet af det modul/element/ressource, der har nærværende brugskontekst (UsageContext).

definition.value: The type of reference range with which it is relevant to use a module/element having this use context (see http://hl7.org/fhir/metadatatypes.html#UsageContext). For this context type, the value should be a code taken from the http://ehealth.sundhed.dk/vs/reference-range-type value set

value.value: Type af grænseværdi med hvilken det er relevant at benytte det modul/element/ressource, der har nærværende brugskontekst (UsageContext).
